RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 72. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 5, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 5, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUMMERTIME BANDIT with the pace after breaking in good order, narrowly showed the way into the turn, dueled while closest to the inside into the stretch, shook clear, maintained a comfortable advantage to the wire while being kept to task. CHARLIE'S PEAK vied early while widest of the first flight up the backstretch, dueled outside the winner into the lane, proved no match for that one in the run to the wire, fully extended to save the place. TUGBOAT jostled at the start to be last away, moved up to race closest to the lead pack up the backstretch and into the turn, two path into the stretch, gaining for the second spot while also not a threat to the winner late. MISS CHARLIE GRAS one paced, came three wide out of the turn, not enough late for the runner up position. KNIGHTS SWORD vied early between the top two, fell back off that pair midway on the turn, went evenly through the stretch. BEYOND D'ORO broke in, bumped inner rival, raced back, five wide exiting the turn, no bid. BE A BANDIT broke out, raced back off the pace, three to four wide into the stretch, failed to produce a rally. HEY MADALYN CLAIRE tired while racing four wide.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Charlie Gras
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, three wide into lane, not enough 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Summertime Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace from start inside,dueled into lane, shook clear,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Knights Sword
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early btwn foes, fell back turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Be a Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, 3-4w into lane, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Tugboat
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled start, moved up closest to lead pace, gaining 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bumped foe, raced back, 5w into lane

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Madalyn Claire
ENTRY.COMMENT: tired while racing four wide

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie's Peak
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early 3w, dueled late turn into lane, no match, saved 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RISKY PRIORITY last to leave, lagged well back off the busy first flight, continued to trail turn, shifted out a bit to be four wide into the lane, rallied well out in the strip to be up in time. INFINITESIMAL moved up to vie four wide out of the chute, continued on the outside through the turn, put a head in front past the furlong marker, led late, nipped at the wire. GOBOT with the pace for over a half three wide and between foes, fell back off the leader in upper stretch, coming again late while dealing with some traffic. PARTY LITTLE BOY contest the issue up front out of the chute closest to the inside, held a slight advantage through the turn, shook clear when straightened for home, caved in the final furlong when headed by the winner. PEANUT N IKE vied up front in the two path while between horses up the backstretch and into the turn, gave way midway on that bend and finished well back.

ENTRY.NAME: Risky Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed well back, moved out, 4w into lane, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Party Little Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: contested pace inside, narrow lead turn, clear, caved in late

ENTRY.NAME: Gobot
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace between foes, fell back upper, coming again late

ENTRY.NAME: Infinitesimal
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to vie four wide, bid midstretch, led late, nipped

ENTRY.NAME: Peanut N Ike
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front 2p and between, gave way turning for home

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 71. Maiden Claiming Purse 18000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUMPIN JUDY away in good order, showed the way up the backstretch and into the turn in hand, extended that advantage into the stretch, held late while being kept to task the final furlong. HIDDEN LOVE off the pace and the inside, lost some position in the turn, two path into the stretch, steadily closing the gap on the winner while too late, edging clear for the place. KISS UPON A STAR within striking distance early outside, closest to the winner through the turn and into the stretch, could do little with that one late, caught for the second spot. RUN AWAY SAMARI settled off the pace inside, continued to save ground turn, went evenly through the stretch in lacking a closing response. CHUCHI went one paced three wide to also be found lacking any late energy. CHACHA TO CATALINA broke in and slowly, void of speed for three furlongs, steered out for the drive, improved position when finding best stride too late. REMEMBERIN RONALD broke back, four wide into the turn, improved a bit into the lane then flattened out some in the final furlong. MY NEW PALACE pressured the winner in the early going from the outside, got out late turn, backed up. BLUERIDGEBALLERINA was finished after three furlongs. QUEEN'S SOLDIER balked at loading, broke through the gate prior to start, reloaded, broke back, showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Chacha to Catalina
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in and slowly, trailed, steered out, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Run Away Samari
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, saved ground, evenly stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Jumpin Judy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace in hand, larger lead in hand, held late, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Queen's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: balked loading, broke thru gate prestart, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: My New Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed winner early, got out late turn, backed up

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace and rail, 2p into lane, closing gap on winner

ENTRY.NAME: Rememberin Ronald
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, four wide turn, flattened out late

ENTRY.NAME: Blueridgeballerina
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished after three furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss Upon a Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance outside, chased, caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Chuchi
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced while three wide

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 21000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAIL THE CAT broke with the field, raced back off the pace and the inside, swept up to challenge four wide into the stretch, clear under a steady right handed crop. SAMURAI'S GRANDSON in the second flight off the inside, roused three wide and behind the winner entering the stretch, had little for that one late, clear of the rest. DREWNANIMOUS last away, trailed, staged some mild interest to finish best of the rest, no threat to the top two. VALLEY MISCHIEF in the second flight, moved to challenge with the winner inside that one exiting the turn, chased, faltered in the final furlong to lose the show. RED IDOL dueled up front along the inside, weakened. POP POP MIKE fell back to trail after the start, failed to menace. SPIRIT OF DREAMS dueled up front for a half two path, shook clear by midway on the turn, stopped when headed by the winner entering the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Valley Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, bid btwn rivals, faltrered

ENTRY.NAME: Drewnanimous
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, mild interest, clear of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Red Idol
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Samurai's Grandson
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, roused 3w into lane, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Pop Pop Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: Spirit of Dreams
ENTRY.OWNER: Winalot Racing LLC Evans Thoroughbred Racing LLC and Cleek Phillip
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early 2p, shoo, ,clear, stopped stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Hail the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with field, back off pace, swept up 4w, clear, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 78. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY LIL DUDE broke well, set or forced the pace off the inside into and through the turn, continued to duel the middle half, gained a slightly larger advantage upper straight, slight drift past the furlong marker when surrounded by traffic, found more and dug in late to prevail in game fashion. CHILI RED settled off the pace and the inside, came four wide for the drive, enjoyed a relatively clean trip to the wire unlike some of his counterparts to his inside, late bid, nod for the place. QUIET AS MIDNIGHT forwardly placed toward the inside, covered up in traffic into the far turn, continued in traffic into the lane, waited, altered course toward the inside inside the furlong marker, finished willingly but missed the place. HEY JACKSON in mid pack off the rail, between foes into the far turn, behind considerable traffic into the lane, shifted outside past the furlong marker for room, finished well while too late. GHOST COWBOY broke in to bother an inner rival, prompted the pace off the inside, remained in a striking position into the lane, was flat late while between horses at the wire. RUN ON ACES back off the pace and the rail, closer through the second turn, caught up in an increasingly large group of horses into the lane, waited a furlong out, continued in traffic and was in close quarters at the wire. ZIPPY TOGA broke back, devoid of speed for five furlongs, made a good gain along the inside through the second turn, saw that advance stall when in a bit tight along the rail into the lane, traffic again with a furlong to run, not enough late while closest to the inside of the lead group at the wire. BIG BROTHER lacked speed, continued back into the lane, displayed a modest amount of late interest. SABERMAN broke on top, set or forced the pace along the inside, gave way in the drive. GOROSTIETA'S LOVE four wide into the first turn, tired from those earlyt efforts. PRINCE SIMBA bothered and off slowly, sluggish, well back first turn, pulled up before a half, vanned off. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF QUIET AS MIDNIGHT AGAINST THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN MIDSTRETCH WAS NOT ALLOWED.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, modest late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet as Midnight
ENTRY.OWNER: PoBoy Racing LLC and Metoyer Rand S
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, traffic 2nd turn, again 1/8,altered 1/16,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Chili Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, 4w into lane,late bid, nod 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Saberman
ENTRY.COMMENT: set or forced pace inside, gave way drive

ENTRY.NAME: My Lil Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, dueled up front 2p, larger lead,slight drift, dug in

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Jackson
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, between foes, traffic 3/16,shifted out,stride late

ENTRY.NAME: Prince Simba
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered, off slow, sluggish, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Ghost Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, bid into lane, flat late btwn foes

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Run On Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, closer 2nd turn, waited, traffic 1/8, again late

ENTRY.NAME: Zippy Toga
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back,void speed,improved 2nd inside,stalled,traffic stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Gorostieta's Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w into first turn, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAXIMUS FREEDOM broke sharp, cleared to the inside, shrugged off nearest pursuer turning for home, drew out under steady handling in promising debut. SOUNDS LIKE POWER bumped at the break, in mid pack early, moved a bit closer four to five wide into the lane, up late for the place, not a serious threat to the winner. SPINNING ACES reluctant to load, moved up steadily the opening quarter to press the winner through the turn from the outside, could not keep up with that one through the lane, caught late for the place. BOBBY TWO SHOT'S broke back, lacked speed for a half, three wide into the lane, improved position through and around traffic, no menace to the top three. JOE T back off the pace and the inside, in the two path out of the turn, also improved by passing mostly tiring rivals. CAJUN CYCLONE in the second flight early, had little left for the stretch run while well off the inside. OTRA COSA in mid pack backstretch, angled out when moving a bit closer three wide into the lane, flattened out the final furlong. CUNIMBUS bumped at the start, raced in the main body for three furlongs, four wide exiting the turn, came up empty for the stretch run. GUS'S DREAM WORLD broke well, raced forwardly and inside for three furlongs, backed up through the stretch. JACK THE WHISTLE lacked speed outside, four wide turning for home, lacked a closing kick. COTEAU RIDGE last away, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Gus's Dream World
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, forward and inside, retreated stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Coteau Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Otra Cosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, bit closer three wide into lane, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Bobby Two Shot's
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 3w into lane, improved thru traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Cyclone
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, weakened well off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Joe T
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, 2p into lane, passed tiring ones

ENTRY.NAME: Jack the Whistle
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w into lane, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Cunimbus
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, main body, 4w, little for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Sounds Like Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, 4-5w turn, up late 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Maximus Freedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, cleared to inside, shrugged off foe,drew out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Allen Cassedy, Lynn J. Thibodeaux Sr. & Patricia G. Thibod

ENTRY.NAME: Spinning Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, moved up to press, caught late 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 7 1/2F Turf CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOSTON PAULETTE forwardly placed along the inside into and through the opening bend, continued to track while saving ground in the second flight up the backstretch, advanced and challenged inside the leader second turn, kicked well clear through the lane under pressure. ELLA'S BABY settled off the pace inside, continued back in the run up the backstretch, improved inside through the second bend, closest to the winner a furlong out, not a threat to that one, edging clear for the runner up position. PAYTON'S INDIAN five wide into the first turn when forwardly placed, settled in the second flight outside the winner, between foes into the lane, vied with the runner up past the furlong marker, outkicked by that one to the wire, clear of the rest. WA WA WEE WA back off the pace and the inside, closer into the lane, went evenly to the finish. MIDNIGHT FAITH showed the way past the wire the first time, continued to set the pace while off the inside, three wide when headed by the winner into the lane, weakened. LAST PENALTY broke in and steadied at the break, void of speed, improved position without posing a serious threat. TOUCHING ACES made little impact from well off thepace. DREAMED I AM FAST broke to the inside, lacked speed and was never involved. SWEETASBAILY forwardly placed early while between rivals, chased the middle portion then gave way. ABBY DABBY pressed the issue early from the three path, fell back then stopped in the far turn, well back.

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamed I Am Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, not involved

ENTRY.NAME: Touching Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: made little impact from back off the pace

ENTRY.NAME: Boston Paulette
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward inside, rail bid 2nd, kicked well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace off rail, clear after half, 3w into lane, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Abby Dabby
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, stopped far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Sweetasbaily
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward, chased backstretch, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Ella's Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace inside, advanced, no match, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Wa Wa Wee Wa
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, closer, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Last Penalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, steadied, back, improved, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Payton's Indian
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w into first turn, 2nd flight, outkicked 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 37000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 5, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANGUM away in good order, allowed the dueling leaders to go early off the inside, continued to stalk in the turn, ranged up on that pair three wide turning for home, wore down the remaining speed with less than a furlong remaining and drove well clear. AUTUMNS STRONG MAN moved up to duel after the start, alternated into and through the turn, edged away from the other speed in upper stretch, offered brief resistance to the winner a furlong out, no match, clear 2nd. SAMMY DANSEUR JR. broke inward but alertly, set or forced the pace for a half closest to the inside, could not match strides with the runner up in upper stretch while also proving no match for the winner the final furlong, well clear of the others. COHERE settled in the second flight outside, lacked a response in the drive. SADIE'S LIGHT second ground inside, weakened through the stretch. CHEATIN CHARLIE last away, fell further back, was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Cheatin Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, fell further back, never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Sammy Danseur Jr.
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in but alertly, alternated up front, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Autumns Strong Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front in the two path, no match winner, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Sadie's Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: weakened inside

ENTRY.NAME: Mangum
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, stalked dueling leaders 3w, bid, took over

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Adcock's Red River Farm, LLC & J. Adcock

ENTRY.NAME: Cohere
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, no kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE MORE SLEEP broke with the leaders,showed the way out of the chute, continued to set a pressured pace into and through the turn, held steady through the lane in holding the runner up safe. MIDNIGHT CROWN forwardly placed up the backstretch, moved up press the winner through the turn, chased through the stretch, little progress on the winner, clearly second best. R T'S IRON MAN settled in mid pack off the inside, three wide for the drive, finished up best of the rest. ANGOLA VACATION back off the pace, improved position into the stretch, went evenly to the wire. UNCLE CHAN forwardly placed up the backstretch, fell back through the bend and also went one paced through the lane. INDEFENSIBLE TOWN last to leave, failed to menace in lacking a bid. D'FESTIVE CAT fell back after breaking with the leaders, did not threaten. ALWAYS LEAVING remained always back. TYLER'S SENSATION pressured the issue for a half, stopped in the turn, well beaten. PER LOUISIANA RULING 25215, ONE MORE SLEEP HAS BEEN DISQUALIFIED FROM FIRST TO UNPLACED FOR A MEDICATION VIOLATION.

ENTRY.NAME: Tyler's Sensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: press the issue for a half, stopped in the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Indefensible Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Chan
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, fell back to mid pack, one paced drive

ENTRY.NAME: dq-One More Sleep
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with leaders,narrowly set early pace, larger lead,held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Crown
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up press through the turn, chased, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: D'festive Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after start, did not threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Angola Vacation
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, improved into lane, evenly stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Always Leaving
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained always back

ENTRY.NAME: R T's Iron Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3winto the lane, best of rest
